Interesting in learning more about the field of document engineering? Checkout
these slide decks to learn more! Each deck explores topics in Python programming
and document engineering. Finally, make sure to review the [course
schedule](../schedule/index.qmd) for more details about how these slides connect
to various course projects.

## Team Presentations

Interesting in learning more about document engineering from the perspective of
students who are exploring the topic? Checkout these slide decks to learn more!
While these slides are not guaranteed to be correct, they should show the
growth of a learner as they develop their knowledge and skills as a
proofgrammer.

:::{#team-presentations}
